trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKTA523_04052_SEQ_00<tab>The decisive dwarf regards you with the steely determination of someone who's about to ask a favor.
TEXT_LUCKTA523_04052_TODO_00<tab>Use the hempen sack to capture a weakened dwarven automaton.
TEXT_LUCKTA523_04052_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the dwarven automaton to the decisive dwarf.
TEXT_LUCKTA523_04052_VILLAGERB03954_000_001<tab>To be deleted.
TEXT_LUCKTA523_04052_VILLAGERD03954_000_005<tab>To be deleted.
TEXT_LUCKTA523_04052_VILLAGERC03954_000_010<tab>Oh, it's you. I've been meaning to apologize─for my behavior at the meeting.
TEXT_LUCKTA523_04052_VILLAGERC03954_000_011<tab>For all my bluster, I had nothing to offer. You made me see the hypocrite that I was, and I'm determined to do better.
TEXT_LUCKTA523_04052_VILLAGERC03954_000_012<tab>I'd be lying if I said I wasn't struggling, though...
TEXT_LUCKTA523_04052_VILLAGERC03954_000_013<tab>We need more automata to help us rebuild, you see, and I thought that we could repurpose the ones we've got guarding the village.

TEXT_LUCKTA523_04052_VILLAGERC03954_000_014<tab>But when I went to shut one down, the blasted thing tried to bash my head in. Barely escaped with my beard, I tell you. Whoever programmed them did their job a little <var 1A 02 /var>too<var 1A 01 /var> well...

TEXT_LUCKTA523_04052_VILLAGERC03954_000_015<tab>You're supposed to be a mighty warrior, though, ain't that right? Think you could subdue an ironbeard for me, just to show how it's done? If I could see it once, I reckon I could deal with them by myself.
TEXT_LUCKTA523_04052_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKTA523_04052_A1_000_001<tab>Just watch and learn.
TEXT_LUCKTA523_04052_A1_000_002<tab>Oh, all right...
TEXT_LUCKTA523_04052_VILLAGERC03954_000_017<tab>I'm in your debt. Here, take this sack. You can slip it over an ironbeard to keep it subdued after you've knocked it around enough.
TEXT_LUCKTA523_04052_VILLAGERB03954_000_020<tab>How fares the peddling? Extremely well! The Eulmorans can't get enough of our rare and wondrous wares.

TEXT_LUCKTA523_04052_VILLAGERD03954_000_021<tab>In spite of myself, I have to say that things are coming along nicely. Who would've thought that we could achieve so much by working together instead of bickering?
TEXT_LUCKTA523_04052_VILLAGERC03954_000_020<tab>In case you weren't sure, the ironbeards patrol the area just west of the village. I'll be watching─from a safe distance.
TEXT_LUCKTA523_04052_VILLAGERC03954_000_100<tab>Bugger my beard, you took care of the automaton so quickly, I would've missed it if I'd blinked!
TEXT_LUCKTA523_04052_VILLAGERC03954_000_101<tab>Thanks for bringing this thing back, and for the lesson as well. I reckon I've got the trick of it now.
TEXT_LUCKTA523_04052_VILLAGERC03954_000_102<tab>I've also come to realize something: there ain't no action so noble as one that you take for another.
TEXT_LUCKTA523_04052_VILLAGERC03954_000_103<tab>I'll keep that close to my heart, and strive to be someone who strives for others, just like you.
TEXT_LUCKTA523_04052_VILLAGERC03954_000_104<tab>By the way, the chief came looking for you while you were outside the village. It seemed important, so go and see what he wants, eh?
TEXT_LUCKTA523_04052_VILLAGERC03954_000_105<tab>Have you gone to see the chief yet? It seemed important, so go and see what he wants, eh?
TEXT_LUCKTA523_04052_VILLAGERB03954_000_150<tab>To be deleted.
TEXT_LUCKTA523_04052_VILLAGERD03954_000_155<tab>To be deleted.
TEXT_LUCKTA523_04052_VILLAGERD03954_000_160<tab>To be deleted.
TEXT_LUCKTA523_04052_VILLAGERC03954_000_170<tab>Ah, it's you again. Thanks to you, we've now got a good lot of automata helping us out, but we could still do with more.

TEXT_LUCKTA523_04052_VILLAGERC03954_000_171<tab>If you're not too busy, do you think you could retrieve another ironbeard for us? Rest assured you won't be doing it alone this time─I'm going to retrieve one too.
TEXT_LUCKTA523_04052_VILLAGERC03954_000_172<tab>When we're done, let's meet back here. Happy deactivating!
TEXT_LUCKTA523_04052_VILLAGERB03954_000_180<tab>There're still some among us who don't understand the work we're doing. But like you won us over, we can win them over too.

TEXT_LUCKTA523_04052_VILLAGERD03954_000_181<tab>Sometimes, someone will come over and tell me off. “The hells you thinking, playing around with bits of those machines? It's downright creepy!” they'd say.
TEXT_LUCKTA523_04052_VILLAGERD03954_000_182<tab>I don't let it discourage me, though. This is what I've chosen to do, and I'm going to keep doing it, rain, hail, or doom.
TEXT_LUCKTA523_04052_VILLAGERC03954_000_200<tab>Ugh, of all the times to get a cramp... You go on ahead─I'll be on my way as soon as I can... <grunt>
TEXT_LUCKTA523_04052_VILLAGERC03954_000_250<tab>Whew... It was rough going even with your example, but I managed to shut down an automaton in the end. How about you?
TEXT_LUCKTA523_04052_VILLAGERC03954_000_251<tab>Great! With these two additional units on duty, I'll be able to spend more time drink─
TEXT_LUCKTA523_04052_VILLAGERC03954_000_252<tab>Er...I mean, I'll be able to spend more time doing...things. That automata can't do. For the rebuilding. Yes, yes, that's it!

TEXT_LUCKTA523_04052_VILLAGERC03954_000_253<tab>...Ahem. Thanks to you, I've found something that I can do for Komra. But as helpful as you are, it wouldn't do to rely on you forever. No, from this point on, I want to make sure I can get by on my own when the time comes.
TEXT_LUCKTA523_04052_VILLAGERC03954_000_254<tab>There might be others who could use a hand, though, so you ought to talk to the chief. Thanks again, and be seeing you!
TEXT_LUCKTA523_04052_VILLAGERC03954_000_255<tab>To be deleted.
